name: Apartment Visitors Management System /admin/bwdates-passreports-details.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Apartment Visitors Management System Apartment Visitors Management System 1.0"]
description: Apartment Visitors Management System是一个公寓访客管理系统。Apartment Visitors Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/admin/bwdates-passreports-details.php中参数fromdate/todate操作不当，。攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
